title: Kalite Kontrol Uzmanı - Çiçek
description:
Bir teknolojisi firması olarak faaliyet gösterdiğimiz tüm pazarlarda lider olmak vizyonuyla çıktığımız yolda bize katılmak ister misiniz?

Kurumsalın alışılagelmiş ifadelerinden ve hiyerarşiden uzak heyecan verici bir kariyere başlamak için en iyi yönlerini ortaya çıkarmaya hazır, dinamik, entelektüel açıdan meraklı genç profesyoneller arıyoruz. Hızla büyümeye devam eden bir teknoloji şirketi olarak gerçek hayatta yaşanan sorunları çözme ve profesyonel yaşamı deneyimleme imkanı sunuyoruz. Yaptığın işin tüm sorumluluğunu almak istiyorsan, işine katkı sağlayacak yeni fikirlerin olduğunda sesini duyurmak istiyorsan ve olağanüstü bir işbaşında eğitim deneyimi yaşamaya hazırsan; o zaman meydan okumaya hazırsın.

Aranan Nitelikler

  • Önlisans ve lisans bölümlerinden mezun
  • Kalite kontrol alanında minimum 1-2 yıl deneyimli
  • Tuzla, Pendik ve Şekerpınar'da ikamet eden
  • Excel bilgisi iyi olan
  • Kesme çiçek, saksı bitkileri veya zirai ürünlerin üretim ve kalite süreçlerine hakim
  • Tercihen kesme çiçek, saksı bitkileri veya zirai ürünlerin üretiminde deneyimli
  • Yoğun çalışma temposuna ve esnek çalışma saatlerine ayak uydurabilecek
  • Planlama, organizasyon ve iletişim becerileri gelişmiş
    • ,

    İş tanımı

  • Çiçek üreticilerinden gelen ürünlerin kalite kontrolünün yapılması
  • Mal kabulü yapılan ürünlerin standartlara uygun olarak depolanmasının takibi
  • Mal kabul & depo süreçlerinin takip edilmesi ve iyileştirilmesi
  • Tüm çiçeklere ait envanterlerin doğru ve düzenli takip edilmesi
  • Sevkiyat öncesi ve sırasında ürünlerin kontrolünün yapılarak standart dışı olan ürünlerin ayrılması
  • Sevkiyatların en hızlı ve hatasız gerçekleştirilmesi için süreçlerin iyileştirilmesi
  • Sahadan gelen geri bildirimleri takip ederek kalite iyileştirme çalışmalarının yapılması
  • Ürünlerin kalitesinin raporlaması
  • Müşterilerin sipariş ettiği ürünlerin görsel aracılığı ile kalitesinin ölçümlenmesi
    • Hakkımızda

    En kolay ve ekonomik yoldan çiçek göndermeyi sağlamak için 2006’da kurulan ciceksepeti.com, Türkiye genelinde 55.000+ iş ortağı ve 70’den fazla ile gönderimini sağladığı binlerce siparişle, Türkiye'deki en büyük online çiçekçidir.

    Çiçeksepeti; çiçek aranjmanları, kek ve kurabiye buketlerinin yanı sıra kişiselleştirilmiş hediyeler ile müşterilerine binlerce alternatif sunarak özel günlerde ilk akla gelen e-ticaret firmasıdır. Türkiye'deki başarı hikâyemizi, LolaFlora markası ile Meksika'da sürdürürken, bir teknoloji firması olarak, hediye alanındaki pazar liderliğimizi yeni iş modellerimize de taşımak vizyonu ile emin adımlarla ilerliyoruz.

    "İşe alım süreçlerimizde kişisel verilerinizi nasıl işlediğimize dair bilgiye çalışan adayı aydınlatma metnimizden ulaşabilirsiniz./ Please see our candidate privacy note for information on how we process your personal data during our recruitment activities."

title: HRBP (Production & Supply Chain) & Talent Acquisition Specialist
description:
Want to join us as we move closer to be a leader in all markets in which we operate, as a pioneering tech company?

We’re looking for bright, intellectually curious young professionals ready to bring out the best in themselves to kick off an exciting career devoid of corporate buzzwords and bureaucracy. Instead, we offer real-life cases to resolve and a true taste of professional life in a high-growth, high-speed tech company.

If you want to hold full accountability of your work, if you want to be heard when you have new ideas to contribute to the business, and if you’re ready to experience an exceptional on-the-job training; then you’re ready for the challenge.

🎯Your Journey Begins: Embrace the Exciting Adventure Ahead!

  • Executing end-to-end (White & Blue Collar) recruitment cycle to ensure a consistent flow of right candidates for the business, an exceptional journey for the candidates, and timely results for the hiring managers
  • Ensuring management of consultancy processes
  • Creating ad hoc reports on recruitment KPIs, by actively using our ATS (applicant tracking system)  
  • Mapping the passive candidates in the industry to create talent-pipelines for prospective business needs
  • Manage and resolve complex employee relations issues
  • Make exit interviews for voluntary submissions and prepare reports
  • Visiting the production center which is located in (Gebze & Pendik) at least 1 or 2 days per week
    • ,

    ✨Let Your Skills Shine with Us!

  • You're comfortable with learning on the fly, tech-savvy, and resourceful 
  • You’re a problem solver
  • You have good communication skills
  • You're an excellent content producer with an eye for details 
  • You're skilled at documenting & presenting your assignments 
  • You're a top-notch recruiter with analytical and creative skills
    • ,

    🥰Are You the One We’re Seeking?

  • BA/BSc degree in relevant academic disciplines
  • 2-3 years of experience in recruitment (white & blue collar) in a high-speed, high-growth environment
  • Advanced skills in MS Office Programs 
  • Strong ability to research and follow-up, successful time management, strong analysis, and reporting skills
    • ,

    😎What’s in here for you?

  • 🎉Fun and Adventure Await: Get ready for exhilarating team adventures and unforgettable company activities that will create memories to cherish! 🌈
  • 🌟Dive into an Exciting World of Entertainment! : Netflix, BluTV, YouTube Premium, and More! 🎬🍿
  • 🎩Express Your Unique Style: No more stuffy suits or uncomfortable attire. Embrace your personal style and wear whatever makes you feel confident and comfortable. 👗👕
  • 📚Unlock Your Potential: Biweekly Learning Hours and a Vast Training Library Await! 🎓 Never stop learning and growing! With unlimited access to top-notch training resources like Udemy and more, your professional growth knows no limits! 🚀
  • 🥰Join Vibrant Social Clubs: Connect, Collaborate, and Create Lifelong Friendships!🎉Be part of our vibrant social clubs, where you can engage with colleagues who share your passions and interests. Cultivate meaningful connections, foster collaboration, and create memories that extend beyond the workplace.🤝
  • 🤝Seamless Onboarding: Receive a Warm Welcome and a Smooth Transition! 📋 Our dedicated onboarding process ensures you feel supported and empowered from day one. We provide comprehensive training and resources to help you settle into your role quickly and effectively. 🌟
  • Join us on this exciting journey where remote work, a dynamic work ecosystem, thrilling team activities, entertainment galore, a flexible dress code, and endless learning opportunities await you! It’s time to unleash your full potential and embrace the future of work! 💃
    • 😍About Us

    As a pioneering tech company in gifts, our vision is to be a leader in all markets in which we operate. We create lifelong value in the lives of our employees, customers and all our business partners! 💪

    Founded in 2006 by Emre Aydın, Ciceksepeti.com offers the broadest selection of flowers & gifts delivered same day within a single experience. We are very proud to have created a culture of celebration among people with our gift arrangements and our brand Bonnyfood. We are committed to continuing this tradition by making every special day memorable. In addition to our original mission of bringing a new perspective to the e-commerce sector in Turkey and making shipping faster and easier, now we offer a diverse range of products under various categories, such as electronics, home & living, personal care, supermarket, cosmetics, fashion, sports & outdoor, hobby, pet shop, jewellery & accessories, as well as flowers and edible flowers since 2019.

    Ciceksepeti.com is the most visited floral and gifting website according to SimilarWeb data, having 4 times more visitors than the second largest player in the world. 😎

    Besides covering 70+ cities in Turkey through 55.000+ vendors and 24x7 customer support, Ciceksepeti has expanded into Mexico with its international brand, LolaFlora.💃

    We are so happy and proud to have been selected the Best Employer Brand at LinkedIn Turkey Talent Awards in 2019 and 2022! 🥳

    Headquartered in İstanbul, we’re a young, nimble, dedicated team of professionals, who are not only hard workers but also smart workers; who know how to get things done in the right way, as well as getting the right things done for our customers. Moreover, we’re on the verge of an exciting episode in our journey as we simultaneously set foot on international markets and grow further in domestic market.

    "İşe alım süreçlerimizde kişisel verilerinizi nasıl işlediğimize dair bilgiye çalışan adayı aydınlatma metnimizden ulaşabilirsiniz./ Please see our candidate privacy note for information on how we process your personal data during our recruitment activities."
